trans-unit.source: Represents an easing function that creates an animated bouncing effect.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma função easing que cria um efeito bouncing animado.

trans-unit.source: The following graph demonstrates BounceEase using different values of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A>, where *f*(*t*) represents the animation progress and *t* represents time.
trans-unit.target: O gráfico seguinte demonstra BounceEase utilizar valores diferentes de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A>, onde *f*(*t*) representa o progresso de animação e *t* representa tempo.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: ![BounceEase EasingMode graphs.](~/add/media/bounceease-graph.png "BounceEase EasingMode graphs.")
trans-unit.target: ![BounceEase EasingMode gráficos. ] (~/add/media/bounceease-graph.png "BounceEase EasingMode gráficos.")

trans-unit.source: You can specify how many bounces occur using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BounceEase.Bounces%2A> property and specify how bouncy (how elastic the bounces are) using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BounceEase.Bounciness%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Pode especificar quantas devoluções ocorrerem utilizando o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BounceEase.Bounces%2A>propriedade e especifique como bouncy (como elástica os devoluções são) utilizando o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BounceEase.Bounciness%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BounceEase.Bounciness%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BounceEase.Bounces%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BounceEase.Bounciness%2A> property specifies the amplitude scaling of the next bounce.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BounceEase.Bounciness%2A>propriedade especifica a escala de amplitude do seguinte bounce.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BounceEase.Bounciness%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, a bounciness value of 2 doubles the amplitude of the next bounce during an ease in, and it halves the amplitude of the next bounce during an ease out.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, um valor de bounciness de 2 duplica amplitude do bounce seguinte durante uma facilidade no e -halves amplitude do bounce seguinte durante uma facilidade enviados.

trans-unit.source: There are several other easing functions besides BounceEase which you can explore using the following Silverlight sample.
trans-unit.target: Existem várias outras funções easing além BounceEase que pode explorar utilizando o exemplo seguinte do Silverlight.

trans-unit.source: [Run this sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=139798&sref=easing_functions_gallery) In addition to using the easing functions included in the run-time, you can create your own custom easing functions by inheriting from <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase>.
trans-unit.target: [Executar este exemplo](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=139798&sref=easing_functions_gallery) além de utilizar as funções easing incluídas no tempo de execução, pode criar as suas próprias funções easing personalizadas ao herdar de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Object Element Usage ``` ```
trans-unit.target: # # Utilização de elemento do objeto de XAML``` ```

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BounceEase"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BounceEase"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of bounces.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o número de devoluções.

trans-unit.source: This property does not include the final half-bounce.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade não inclui o meio-bounce final.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[DP_ID_field_label](~/add/includes/dp-id-field-label-md.md)] ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ```
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[DP_ID_field_label](~/add/includes/dp-id-field-label-md.md)] # # XAML utilização de atributos ``` ```

trans-unit.source: The number of bounces.
trans-unit.target: O número de devoluções.

trans-unit.source: The value must be greater than or equal to zero.
trans-unit.target: O valor tem de ser maior que ou igual a zero.

trans-unit.source: Negative values resolve to zero.
trans-unit.target: Resolva os valores negativos para zero.

trans-unit.source: The default is 3.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é 3.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BounceEase.Bounces*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BounceEase.Bounces*>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BounceEase.Bounces*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies how bouncy the bounce animation is.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que especifica o como bouncy a animação bounce.

trans-unit.source: Low values of this property result in bounces with little lose of height between bounces (more bouncy) while high values result in dampened bounces (less bouncy).
trans-unit.target: Baixos valores este resultado de propriedade no devoluções com pouco perdem-se da altura entre devoluções (mais bouncy) enquanto valores elevados resultam em Atenuado devoluções (menos bouncy).

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[DP_ID_field_label](~/add/includes/dp-id-field-label-md.md)] ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ```
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[DP_ID_field_label](~/add/includes/dp-id-field-label-md.md)] # # XAML utilização de atributos ``` ```

trans-unit.source: The value that specifies how bouncy the bounce animation is.
trans-unit.target: O valor que especifica o como bouncy a animação bounce.

trans-unit.source: This value must be positive.
trans-unit.target: Este valor tem de ser positivo.

trans-unit.source: The default value is `2`.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é `2`.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BounceEase.Bounciness*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BounceEase.Bounciness*>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BounceEase.Bounciness*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable"></xref> derived class.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable"> </xref> classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: When creating a derived class, you must override this method.
trans-unit.target: Ao criar uma classe derivada, tem de substituir este método.

trans-unit.source: Animation classes inherit indirectly from <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>.
trans-unit.target: Classes de animação herdarem indiretamente <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: Because of this, you need to override the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BackEase.CreateInstanceCore%2A> method to construct a custom animation object.
trans-unit.target: Por este motivo, terá de substituir o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BackEase.CreateInstanceCore%2A>método para construir um objeto de animação personalizada.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BackEase.CreateInstanceCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: The new instance.
trans-unit.target: A nova instância.

trans-unit.source: Provides the logic portion of the easing function that you can override to produce the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode"></xref> mode of the custom easing function.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a parte da lógica da função easing que pode substituir para produzir o <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode"> </xref> modo da função easing personalizado.

trans-unit.source: This method transforms normalized time to control the pace of an animation for the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode> case of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Este método transforma normalizado tempo para controlar o ritmo de um animação para o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode>caso de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode>

trans-unit.source: You only have to specify your easing function for the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode> case because the implementation of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.Ease%2A> method transforms `normalizedTime` for the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode> cases.
trans-unit.target: Só tem de especificar a sua função easing para o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode>caso porque a implementação do <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.Ease%2A>transformações de método `normalizedTime` para o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode>e <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode>casos.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.Ease%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode>

trans-unit.source: Normalized time (progress) of the animation.
trans-unit.target: Hora (progresso) normalizada da animação.

trans-unit.source: A double that represents the transformed progress.
trans-unit.target: Um valor de duplo que representa o progresso transformado.
